options.name: Shocktrooper
options.description: Gain +1 Physical Mitigation while wearing Heavy Armor. You no longer suffer movement speed penalties from Heavy Armor.

options.name: Juggernaut Charge
options.description: When you move at least 3 units in a straight line toward an enemy and then hit them with a melee attack, you push them back 1 unit and they become Prone.

options.name: Reinforced Plating
options.description: Gain +1 to all Mitigations while wearing Heavy Armor.

options.name: Powered Servos
options.description: Gain +1 Movement Speed and +1 Strength while wearing Heavy Armor.

options.name: Action : Overwatch
options.description: Enter a defensive stance until the start of your next turn. During this time, when an enemy moves within your attack range, you can make an attack against them as a reaction.

options.name: Reaction : Hold the Line
options.description: When an enemy would move past you, you can make a Strength check to stop their movement. If successful, they remain adjacent to you and cannot move further this turn.

options.name: Ablative Armor
options.description: The first time you would take damage in combat while wearing Heavy Armor, reduce that damage to 0. This ability recharges when you take a short rest.

options.name: Action : Breaching Charge
options.description: You charge forward up to your movement speed in a straight line. Any barriers, obstacles, or enemies in your path take 2d6 damage and are pushed 1 unit to either side.

options.name: Walking Tank
options.description: Gain immunity to Prone and Pushed conditions while wearing Heavy Armor. Additionally, gain +2 Physical Mitigation.

options.name: Master Shocktrooper
options.description: While wearing Heavy Armor, you gain an additional action each turn that can only be used for movement or to make a basic attack. Additionally, gain +5 maximum Health.
